motivational.quote: The Best Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
motivational.author: Walt Disney

motivational.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
motivational.author: Will Rogers

motivational.quote: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don’t Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.
motivational.author: Unknown

motivational.quote: It’s Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It’s Whether You Get Up.
motivational.author: Vince Lombardi

motivational.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
motivational.author: Rob Siltanen

motivational.quote: Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough.
motivational.author: Og Mandino

motivational.quote: Entrepreneurs Are Great At Dealing With Uncertainty And Also Very Good At Minimizing Risk. That’s The Classic Entrepreneur.
motivational.author: Mohnish Pabrai

motivational.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
motivational.author: Maya Angelou

motivational.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
motivational.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

motivational.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
motivational.author: Henry Ford

motivational.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
motivational.author: Helen Keller

motivational.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
motivational.author: Hasidic Proverb

motivational.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.
motivational.author: Don Zimmer

motivational.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Develop An ‘Attitude Of Gratitude’. Say Thank You To Everyone You Meet For Everything They Do For You.
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

motivational.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Reading Is To The Mind, As Exercise Is To The Body.
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.quote: For Every Reason It’s Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded.
motivational.author: Jack Canfield

motivational.quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
motivational.author: John Wooden

motivational.quote: A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul.
motivational.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

fun.quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
fun.author: John F. Kennedy

fun.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
fun.author: Lily Tomlin

fun.quote: I’m in shape. Round is a shape.
fun.author: George Carlin

fun.quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
fun.author: Erma Bombeck

fun.quote: If you can’t live without me, why aren’t you dead already?
fun.author: Cynthia Heimel

fun.quote: He who laughs last didn’t get the joke.
fun.author: Charles de Gaulle

fun.quote: My favourite machine at the gym is the vending machine.
fun.author: Caroline Rhea

fun.quote: If a book about failures doesn’t sell, is it a success?
fun.author: Jerry Seinfeld

fun.quote: If you’re too open-minded; your brains will fall out.
fun.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

fun.quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
fun.author: Will Rogers

fun.quote: I don’t hate you. I just don’t like that you exist
fun.author: Gena Showalter

fun.quote: Don’t gobblefunk around with words.
fun.author: Roald Dahl

fun.quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.
fun.author: Benjamin Franklin

fun.quote: The funniest people are the saddest ones.
fun.author: Confucius

fun.quote: Why is there so much month left at the end of the money?
fun.author: John Barrymore

fun.quote: I came from a real tough neighbourhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn’t a professional, the knife had butter on it.
fun.author: Rodney Dangerfield

fun.quote: A word to the wise ain’t necessary, it’s the stupid ones who need advice.
fun.author: Bill Cosby

fun.quote: Always go to other people’s funerals, otherwise, they won’t come to yours.
fun.author: Yogi Berra

fun.quote: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
fun.author: James Thurber

fun.quote: I’d rather have 1% of the effort of 100 men than 100% of my own effort.
fun.author: J. Paul Getty

fun.quote: Hooray! Hooray! The end of the world has been postponed!
fun.author: Hergé
